channel.title: Suggest a Good Source?
channel.description:
Hello, I'm looking to create a new server, but sadly...I can't seem to find the perfect source. :(
I'm sort of picky when it comes to sources because what I have in mind, is the PERFECT server (in my opinion).
[u]I'm looking for the following in a souce:[/u]
[ul][li]"New" Items (Godswords, dark bows, dragon full helm, etc.)[/li] [li]No world-wide wilderness (can't pk wherever you go)[/li] [li]Skills are rediculously easy to train (4M xp gets you level 99)[/li] [li]No "teleporting" emotes (click "Home" in the emotes and you teleport)[/li] [li]No irregular commands[/li] [li]Not "laggy"[/li] [li]Working teleportation spells (Lumbridge teleport actually teleports you to lumbridge)[/li][/ul]
I've looked pratically [b]EVERYWHERE[/b] and have found many nice servers, but the all had something wrong with them that I don't really like.
Sorry to be so specific, but could you help me out? :)

item.title: Suggest a Good Source?
item.dc:creator: @Vulcan_Wicked Vulcan_Wicked
item.description:
@Vulcan_Wicked wrote:

Sounds good, thank-you very much. I’lltry it out and possibly give feedback on the wherabouts of my “server”.

Thank-you for your time.

Read full topic

item.title: Suggest a Good Source?
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

It’s possible, If they are not too extreme such as;

Building your own maps - Requires alot more research in clients.

And a few more, It’s all possible, Just have to learn more about it.

Read full topic

@rash wrote:

You can add them yourself

item.title: Suggest a Good Source?
item.dc:creator: @Vulcan_Wicked Vulcan_Wicked
item.description:
@Vulcan_Wicked wrote:

Hmm…a blank server. Is it possible to add all the features I’d liek to have?

Read full topic

item.title: Suggest a Good Source?
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

You will find no source out there that is perfect enough for you,
What you need to do Is either start from scratch or download a blank server and Start moulding
it around to the way you want it to be.

Read full topic

item.title: Suggest a Good Source?
item.dc:creator: @Vulcan_Wicked Vulcan_Wicked
item.description:
@Vulcan_Wicked wrote:

Hello, I’m looking to create a new server, but sadly…I can’t seem to find the perfect source.

I’m sort of picky when it comes to sources because what I have in mind, is the PERFECT server (in my opinion).

I’m looking for the following in a souce:

[ul][li]“New” Items (Godswords, dark bows, dragon full helm, etc.)[/li]
[li]No world-wide wilderness (can’t pk wherever you go)[/li]
[li]Skills are rediculously easy to train (4M xp gets you level 99)[/li]
[li]No “teleporting” emotes (click “Home” in the emotes and you teleport)[/li]
[li]No irregular commands[/li]
[li]Not “laggy”[/li]
[li]Working teleportation spells (Lumbridge teleport actually teleports you to lumbridge)[/li][/ul]

I’ve looked pratically EVERYWHERE and have found many nice servers, but the all had something wrong with them that I don’t really like.

Sorry to be so specific, but could you help me out?
